com.moback.android

Class MoBackImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moback.android.MoBackImageLoader

  • public class MoBackImageLoader
extends Object
    Contains the network task to retrieve the image Contains the cache for images Contains the listener for MoBackImageView calls Tightly coupled with RCImageView
    Since:
    Build 1
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Mark Stanford 6/2/2014

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageCache
      Contains the ImageCache for the RCImageLoader
      class  MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageContainer
      Holds the Image for the MoBackImageView
      class  MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageDownloader
      Downloads the image.
      static interface  MoBackImageLoader.MoBackImageListener
      Interface for the MoBackImageView and MoBackImageLoader callback

      • isCached

        public boolean isCached(String requestUrl)
        Checks if the item is available in the cache.
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - The url of the remote image
        Returns:
        True if the item exists in cache, false otherwise.
